item.description:
ATTN: For those of you who have made New Year's Resolutions to Make More $$$$

 

My mentor is coming to WOBURN, MA Sat Jan 5th 10- 12:30 to share how he makes 6 FIGURES every 14 days!!!  He has personally helped me make 100s and 100s and 100s of thousands of $$$$ as well.

If you are interested in simply looking at other income streams that don't involve a lot of $ or time on your part.. feel free to give me a call. We are not selling anything and this is not Market America/Amway or NuSkin... we simply share a very unique way of making RESIDUAL Income and are going to share something that is going to happen anyway with or without me/you and before anyone really evens knows about it.

If you want more information and your complimentary ticket to meet him and myself...simply give me a call @ 603-490-4371. Maryellen

 

HAPPY NEW YEAR....2013 is going to be the BEST YEAR EVER....for those who take action.
item.how_to_find_us: You must Call me for complimentary invitation
